text: Isn't this place need any review or something ?? This is my personal favourite place for vada pav. Especially Butter vada pav. Taste of this place never changed. They use only Amul butter and make vada pav with a lot of butter. Must visit.

I had ordered from here. The vadapav had oil DRIPPING from it. And had ordered the veg aaloo mutter sandwich and puff,the stuffing of sandwich STANK. Puff had so less filling,it was like eating a khari.

Before sometimes we have ordered vadapav and it was awesome. Specially I have mentioned spicy and they made it. Perfect taste super spicy loved it. Puff is also good though we couldn't able to click pic because of hunger. Definitely recommend
This small outlet is about memories... During office break, we used to eat a lot and quite frequently. Taste was good and service was quicker.
One Of The Best Place For Having Vadapav, And Yes Sandwich was also So Nice... I'm Eating Vadapav of This Place Since 2 Years... Awesome Quality and Taste is Just Amazing
nice, but i ordered and selected JAIN PREPARATION, but i was provided regular vadapav
cheecheese vada pav with out cheese
Ahmedabad's best vadapav is found here!
very good on taste like always but very very oily like everytime
Ordered butter vadapav and they delivered oil vadapav.
it was poorly made n didn't taste like one which is served at place

I shall regularly order with Zomato if this is the Quality. Was upto the mark.
One of the best vadapau in town. Try butter vadapau. It's amazing Service 5/5 Teste 5/5 Cleanness 2.5/5 P.S- Needs improvement for cleanness of shop.
The food was upto the mark.Shreejikrupa dint disappoint as usual.

Ordered vada pav and it was good as usual..... Quality was good as expected btt the food was nt on time... Bit late which can be improved... Btt overall it was nice.... Happy ordering in zomato.. Thanks 👍👍😉
had pieces of paper inside pizza. I have images of same and was about to complaint to provider.
Loved the vadapav. The sandwich was good and the pizza was okayish. I got the butter vadapav and it was heavenly. I used to have it a long time back and it still tastes fantastic.
Extraordinary vadapavs...BEST VADAPAV IN AHMEDABAD...MUST TRY...I AM A REGULAR CUSTOMER AND I LOVE IT.I DONT KNOW WHY ZOMATO DIDNT REVIEW IT EARLIER...
